#summary How to uninstall Windows Drivers

You may need to be logged in as Administrator to perform the following.

 # Get to _System Properties_.  You can either right-click on _My Computer_ and click _Properties_, or you can go to _Start_, then _Control Panel_, then _System_.
 # Select the _Hardware_ tab and click _Device Manager_.
 # Find the device whose drivers you want to uninstall.  In this case, it is the _AT90USB162 DFU_ driver listed under _LibUSB-Win32 Devices_.
 # Select the _Driver_ tab and click _Uninstall_.
 # Agree and follow instructions until Windows is done uninstalling.
